//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( $get( STRING, "SET_PARM1")$, /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ INSERT )
{
	use ( "boomcrates1" );
	use ( "tr_barrells" );
	use ( $get( FLOAT, "SET_PARM3")$ );
	remove ( $get( STRING, "SET_PARM4")$ );

	task ( "boom" )
	{
		play ( /*@PLAY_TYPES*/ "PLAY_ROFF", "scripts/pra2/roadblock.rof" );
	}

	dowait ( "boom" );
}
